Charleston.W.E. Chilton II House: W. E. Chilton II House is a historic home located at Charleston, West Virginia. It is a neo-Georgian stone house designed by nationally known architect William Lawrence Bottomley and built in 1933, for W .E. Chilton II and his wife Nancy Ruffner Chilton. The ​2 1⁄2-story central block of the house is flanked symmetrically by single-story wings.
